correctness.rationale: Several key fields are correct and traceable (PEALD method for In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO; precursors DADI/TMGa/DEZ; O2 plasma at 100 W; Ar carrier/purge; T=200 °C; P≈1.2 Torr; supercycle ratio 6:1:1; TG‑BC device with VTH≈0.05 V, μFE≈27.6 cm2/Vs, SS≈61 mV/dec). However, many entries are incorrect, ungrounded, or violate schema/unit intent: (1) DosingTime/PurgeTime for In2O3/Ga2O3/ZnO are taken from the Al2O3 GI process (0.1 s/5 s/25 s/20 s) and are not reported for IGZO PEALD; moreover the unit used is MilliSEC but numeric values are seconds (e.g., 5.0 ms vs 5 s), causing unit mismatch. (2) FlowRates (99.999 sccm) are fabricated by misusing Ar purity (99.999%)—no flow values are reported. (3) GrowthPerCycle 0.9 Å for all oxides is taken from Al2O3 GPC and is not provided for IGZO sub‑cycles; NumberofCycles = 8 is also not reported. (4) MaterialProperties: refractiveIndex = 1.62 and filmDensity = 2.96 g/cm3 correspond to Al2O3 (GI), not IGZO; absorptionCoefficient set to 0 is unjustified. (5) ElectricalProperties: resistivity = 1.34 Ω·m misinterprets the reported conductivity (1.34 S/cm) and is numerically wrong by orders of magnitude; carrierDensity uses an incompatible unit (C/m3) and unconverted value (reported values are in cm−3 for TCAD, not measured for the film). (6) Uniformity variation = 0% and Conformality aspectRatio = 0 are not reported and scientifically implausible as defaults. (7) FilmComposition.elementalConcentration has a 0% placeholder; only the atomic ratio In:Ga:Zn = 0.52:0.18:0.30 (XRF) is supported. (8) Other minor schema issues/overreach: nucleationPeriod = 0 and saturation = true lack support; deliveryMethod text is not a delivery method; potential extra filmThickness at processParameters level may violate allowed properties. Corrections needed: remove or mark as unknown all unreported dosing/purge/flow/GPC/numberofCycles/uniformity/conformality/roughness values; fix time units (seconds) or omit; correct resistivity or report conductivity with proper units; restrict optical/density values to IGZO-only measurements; ensure carrier density units/values are correct or omit; keep only traceable, schema-compliant fields.

completeness.rationale: Significant gaps and several schema/factual inconsistencies remain. Key issues: (1) Missing process: the article reports two distinct ALD processes (IGZO PEALD and Al2O3 GI ALD). Only the IGZO process is represented; the Al2O3 process (TMA/O3, 200–400 °C, 350 mTorr, step times 0.1 s/25 s/5 s/20 s) should be extracted as a separate process. (2) Misassigned/incorrect timings: the dosing/purge times provided (0.1 and 5 with MilliSEC units) are taken from the Al2O3 process and are misapplied to IGZO; units are wrong by 10^3 (seconds reported in the article vs milliseconds in the JSON). (3) Untraceable/incorrect flow rates: values of 99.999 SCM-PER-MIN for precursor/co-reactant/purge flows are fabricated from Ar purity (99.999%) and not reported as flow; units and magnitudes are invalid. (4) Thickness control errors: GPC 0.9 Å/cycle and number of cycles = 8 are not reported for IGZO (0.9 Å/cycle pertains to Al2O3, Fig. S5). With 8 cycles an 8 nm film is impossible; number of supercycles/cycles is missing in the article and must not be invented. (5) Schema violation: processParameters includes a top-level filmThickness property that is not in the schema (filmThickness belongs under thicknessControl only). (6) Material properties misattributed: refractive index (1.62) and film density (2.96 g/cm3) are for Al2O3, not IGZO; placed under IGZO’s materialProperties. (7) Electrical properties errors: resistivity derived from 1.34 S/cm is incorrect (should be ~0.0075 Ω·m, not 1.34 Ω·m); carrier density unit/type is wrong (used C-PER-M3 and wrong magnitude vs 2×10^17 cm^-3). (8) Composition: elementalConcentration value is 0% (invalid); only the cation ratio In:Ga:Zn = 0.52:0.18:0.30 is supported by XRF. (9) Required but unsupported fields assigned placeholders: uniformity variation = 0%, conformality aspect ratio = 0, roughness = 0 nm with “Not Found”; none are reported. (10) Device properties partly incomplete: on/off ratio is set to 0 (not reported); hysteresis from the article (0.01 V) is missing. Overall, while some core IGZO PEALD details are correct (precursors, O2 plasma at 100 W, 200 °C, 1.2 Torr, supercycle 6:1:1, composition In0.52Ga0.18Zn0.30O, device metrics), the extraction contains many invented or misapplied values and omits the separate Al2O3 ALD process. Review/correct: add a second Al2O3 process; fix timing units and association; remove/replace unreported flow rates, GPC and number of cycles; correct resistivity and carrier density units/values; provide proper IGZO material properties (or omit if not reported); add device hysteresis; remove schema-violating fields.
